words.ex: He remained obdurate despite repeated appeals for compromise.
The report’s vague language only served to obfuscate the issue.
She gave an oblique answer that revealed very little.
The explosion obliterated all traces of the structure.
He walked on, oblivious to the chaos around him.
His obnoxious behavior drove everyone away.
The staff became uncomfortably obsequious around wealthy clients.
She remained obstinate even when presented with clear evidence.
The obstreperous crowd made it impossible to continue the speech.
The advertisement was so obtrusive it ruined the reading experience.
He pretended to be obtuse to avoid answering the question.
The new system obviates the need for manual checks.
A blood clot occluded the artery.
They condemned the odious practice without hesitation.
An officious clerk insisted on unnecessary paperwork.
Dark clouds gathered in an ominous silence.
The regime acted as though it were omnipotent.
The narrator adopts an omniscient perspective.
The contract imposed onerous obligations on small businesses.
The onus is on the applicant to provide accurate information.
The instructions were so opaque that no one could follow them.
Experts opined that the policy would need revision.
They seized the opportune moment to launch the product.
The scandal brought widespread opprobrium upon the organization.
Despite setbacks, she remained cautiously optimistic.
They dined in an opulent hall adorned with gold.
His oratorical skill captivated the audience.
The ornate ceiling drew everyone’s attention.
She challenged the orthodox view with new evidence.
Public opinion continued to oscillate between support and doubt.
His ostensible reason for leaving was a scheduling conflict.
The billionaire’s ostentatious display of wealth drew criticism.
He was ostracized by colleagues after the controversy.
The proposal was dismissed as too outlandish to consider.
The system relied on outmoded technology.
His overbearing attitude stifled creativity.
She became overwrought after hours of uncertainty.
